1.brief: an offence (sometimes habitual sinfulness), and its penalty, occasion, sacrifice, or expiation; also (concretely) an offender
Jehudah (or Judah), the name of five Israelites; also of the tribe descended from the first, and of its territory
to grave, by implication, to write (describe, inscribe, prescribe, subscribe)
iron (as cutting); by extension, an iron implement
properly, a claw, i.e. (human) nail; also the point of astyle (or pen, tipped with adamant)
a thorn; also (from its keenness for scratching) a gem, probably the diamond

to scratch, i.e. (by implication) to engrave, plough; hence (from the use of tools) to fabricate (of any material); figuratively, to devise (in a bad sense); hence (from the idea of secrecy) to be silent, to let alone; hence (by implication) to be deaf (as an accompaniment of dumbness)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
probably meaning to glisten; a tablet (as polished), of stone, wood or metal
the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
a horn (as projecting); by implication, a flask, cornet; by resemblance. an elephant's tooth (i.e. ivory), a corner (of the altar), a peak (of a mountain), a ray (of light); figuratively, power

2.brief: properly, to mark (so as to be recognized), i.e. to remember; by implication, to mention;  to be male
a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)
Asherah (or Astarte) a Phoenician goddess; also an image of the same
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
a tree (from its firmness); hence, wood (plural sticks)
verdant; by analogy, new; figuratively, prosperous
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

3.brief: probably a force, whether of men, means or other resources; an army, wealth, virtue, valor, strength
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
to give, used with greatest latitude of application (put, make, etc.)
an offence (sometimes habitual sinfulness), and its penalty, occasion, sacrifice, or expiation; also (concretely) an offender
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
properly, a cord (as twisted), i.e. (by implication) a boundary; by extension the territory inclosed

4.brief: to fling down; incipiently to jostle; figuratively, to let alone, desist, remit
properly, something inherited, i.e. (abstractly) occupancy, or (concretely) an heirloom; generally an estate, patrimony or portion
who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
to give, used with greatest latitude of application (put, make, etc.)
to work (in any sense); by implication, to serve, till, (causatively) enslave, etc.
properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles

to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
(by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
properly, the nose or nostril; hence, the face, and occasionally a person; also (from the rapid breathing in passion) ire
as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
properly, concealed, i.e. the vanishing point; generally, time out of mind (past or future), i.e. (practically) eternity; frequentatively, adverbial (especially with prepositional prefix) always

5.brief: properly, like this, i.e. by implication, (of manner) thus (or so); also (of place) here (or hither); or (of time) now
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
properly, a valiant man or warrior; generally, a person simply
who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
figuratively, to trust, be confident or sure
ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)
to put (used in a great variety of applications, literal, figurative, inferentially, and elliptically)
flesh (from its freshness); by extension, body, person; also (by euphemistically) the pudenda of aman
the arm (as stretched out), or (of animals) the foreleg; figuratively, force
properly, a part of; hence (prepositionally), from or out of in many senses
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything

a juniper (from its nudity of situation)
a desert; especially (with the article prefix) the (generally) sterile valley of the Jordan and its continuation to the Red Sea
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to see, literally or figuratively (in numerous applications, direct and implied, transitive, intransitive and causative)

to go or come (in a wide variety of applications)

a step or (collectively, stairs, as ascending); usually a holocaust (as going up in smoke)
properly, a slaughter, i.e. the flesh of an animal; by implication, a sacrifice (the victim or the act)
a donation; euphemistically, tribute; specifically a sacrificial offering (usually bloodless and voluntary)
frankincense (from its whiteness or perhaps that of its smoke)
to go or come (in a wide variety of applications)
properly, an extension of the hand, i.e. (by implication) avowal, or (usually) adoration; specifically, a choir of worshippers
a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God

27.brief: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to hear intelligently (often with implication of attention, obedience, etc.; causatively, to tell, etc.)
near, with or among; often in general, to
to be (causatively, make, pronounce or observe as) clean (ceremonially or morally)
properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
intermission, i.e (specifically) the Sabbath
properly, a failure of, i.e. (used only as a negative particle, usually with a prepositional prefix) not, except, without, unless, besides, because not, until, etc.
to lift, in a great variety of applications, literal and figurative, absolute and relative
a burden; specifically, tribute, or (abstractly) porterage; figuratively, an utterance, chiefly adoom, especially singing; mental, desire
to go or come (in a wide variety of applications)
an opening, i.e. door or gate
Jerushalaim or Jerushalem, the capital city of Palestine
a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
intermission, i.e (specifically) the Sabbath
to burn or set on fire; figuratively, to desolate
fire (literally or figuratively)
an opening, i.e. door or gate
to eat (literally or figuratively)
a citadel (from its height)
Jerushalaim or Jerushalem, the capital city of Palestine
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to expire or (causatively) to extinguish (fire, light, anger)
